property.label: Indicator Type
property.name: indicatorType
property.description: Vertical, Horizontal, Path, Bar, VertNav, or Ring

property.label: Comma-Separated List of Steps
property.name: stepList
property.description: Example: Step 1,Step 2,Step 3. Recommend storing this in a constant.

property.label: Current Step Percentage Completion (Optional)
property.name: currentStepPercentage
property.description: Optional. Must be integer between 0 and 100. Leave blank unless you want to override the auto-calculated percentage. Only affects Ring and Bar indicator types.
